Package blackjack.participants

Class Dealer

java.lang.Object
blackjack.participants.Participant
blackjack.participants.Dealer
public class Dealer extends Participant
Represents a dealer in the Blackjack game. Inherits base functionality from Participant and adds dealer-specific logic.

  • Method Details

    • shouldHit

      public boolean shouldHit()
      Determines whether the dealer should take another card. The dealer hits until the sum reaches 17 or more.
      Returns:
      true if the dealer should hit, false if the dealer should stand

    • makeMove

      public RoundResult makeMove(Shoe shoe, Dealer dealer)
      Plays the dealer's turn according to blackjack rules. The dealer hits until the sum reaches 17 or more.
      Specified by:
      makeMove in class Participant
      Parameters:
      dealer - the dealer
      shoe - the card shoe

    • dealInitialCards

      public void dealInitialCards(Player player, Dealer dealer, Shoe shoe)
      Deals initial cards to player and dealer. Each participant receives two cards.
      Parameters:
      player - the player
      dealer - the dealer
      shoe - the card shoe

    • checkInitialHand

      public RoundResult checkInitialHand()
      Description copied from class: Participant
      Checks the initial hand for blackjack. Determines if the player has natural blackjack (21 points with two cards).
      Specified by:
      checkInitialHand in class Participant
      Returns:
      BLACKJACK if the player has blackjack, CONTINUE if the game continues
